local_intent: Ensure grape is perceived, approach the target, open the gripper to 0.06 m for pre-grasp, and verify pose consistency at the target.
assumptions: MoveTo positions the end-effector at the grape pre-grasp vicinity managed by controller
Gripper opening width of 0.06 m is safe for pinch pre-grasp
coherence_with_global: Respects global flow: perception via visibility/scan, approach toward grape, perform OpenGripper with specified width and timeout, verify position with IsAt. Values match allowed bins and maintain the gentle pre-grasp setup before grasp planning.
